items.sentence: Tom was trying to control his own violent temper.
I don\'t know if we\'re going to make it on time.
Tom lost his parents when he was three years old.
Tom made Mary a peanut butter and jelly sandwich.
Tom was on his way home when he got hit by a car.
Is it true that you were Tom\'s first girlfriend?
Tom was a little surprised by Mary\'s conclusion.
Tom could read before he started going to school.
Tom could understand what Mary was trying to say.
You don\'t want Tom to do that right now, do you?
